productsServices.name: Premium Office Stationery Set
productsServices.description: Complete set of high-quality office stationery including files, folders, pens, staplers, paper clips, and desk organizers.
productsServices.longDescription:
This premium office stationery set includes everything you need for a productive workspace. Made from high-quality materials designed to last, each item in this set has been carefully selected for durability and functionality.

The set includes:
‚Ä¢ 10 High-quality hanging files
‚Ä¢ 5 Document folders with tabs
‚Ä¢ 12 Premium ballpoint pens
‚Ä¢ 1 Heavy-duty stapler with 1000 staples
‚Ä¢ 2 Boxes of paper clips (100 each)
‚Ä¢ 1 Desk organizer tray
‚Ä¢ 1 Scissors
‚Ä¢ 1 Tape dispenser with tape

All products come with our quality guarantee and are suitable for professional office environments.
